summary: This module contains unit tests that verify the behavior of primer and probe parameter classes used with Primer3. The tests check that objects enforce length constraints, raise errors on invalid configurations, correctly construct valid parameter instances, and translate those instances into Primer3 input tags, including handling of maximum amplicon and primer lengths.
business_intent: Validate that primer and probe configuration objects conform to design specifications and can be reliably converted into Primer3 input formats, ensuring robust downstream primer design workflows.
